text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse If u had a shred of decency or were the Christian u claim to be, you'd stand up for our country. Your loyalty to #TraitorTrump renders u complicit in 137k COVID19 deaths & every troop killed for #RussianBounty. You'll pay a heavy price. You could've been a hero. Your Jesus weeps.
